argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | matvscl.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | matvscl.a | |- A = ( N Mat R ) |
| 3 |  | matvscl.b | |- B = ( Base ` A ) |
| 4 |  | matvscl.s | |- .x. = ( .s ` A ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_matlmod | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> A e. LMod ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( C e. K /\ X e. B ) ) -> A e. LMod ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_matsca2 | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> R = ( Scalar ` A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> K = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eleq2d | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( C e. K <-> C e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_biimpd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( C e. K -> C e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_adantrd | |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) -> ( ( C e. K /\ X e. B ) -> C e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_imp | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( C e. K /\ X e. B ) ) -> C e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( C e. K /\ X e. B ) ) -> X e. B ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Scalar ` A ) = ( Scalar ` A ) |
| 16 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) = ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) |
| 17 | 3, 15, 4, 16 | #P_lmodvscl | |- ( ( A e. LMod /\ C e. ( Base ` ( Scalar ` A ) ) /\ X e. B ) -> ( C .x. X ) e. B ) |
| 18 | 6, 13, 14, 17 | #P_syl3anc | |- ( ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. Ring ) /\ ( C e. K /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( C .x. X ) e. B ) |
